Package gameWorld.rooms

Class ShopRoom

java.lang.Object
gameWorld.rooms.Room
gameWorld.rooms.ShopRoom
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class ShopRoom
extends Room
A ShopRoom is a Room, that holds three items with a set price. Those item can be bought by the Hero in exchange for some coins.

To check what the other variable from NonStaticObject are please refer to Room.

See Also:
GroundItem, Serialized Form

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    ShopRoom​(Hero hero)
    Constructs a new ShopRoom, whose Hero is specified by the Hero argument.

  • Constructor Details

    • ShopRoom

      public ShopRoom​(Hero hero)
      Constructs a new ShopRoom, whose Hero is specified by the Hero argument. And spawns every shop item with the price label in the room.
      Parameters:
      hero - the hero of the new ShopRoom

  • Method Details

    • makeGroundItemPlay

      public void makeGroundItemPlay()
      Compared to the Room.makeGroundItemPlay() function, this one needs to know if the Hero is interacting with the item to buy it.

      If the Hero interacts to buy the item and has enough coins then he will lose the coin value of that item and receive it in his inventory, dropping the first item of his inventory if he didn't have any space left in his inventory.

      If the Hero interacts with an item that's not sold by the shop it will add it to his inventory, and drop the first item of his inventory if he didn't have any space left in his inventory.

    • drawGroundItem

      public void drawGroundItem()
      Draws every GroundItem in the ShopRoom. On top of that if the GroundItem is from the shop it draws the price label.
